message: Hello Bob, I'm offering this item for $130. I believe it's a very fair price considering its value.
I appreciate your time, Alice. I'm willing to pay $120 for the product. I think it's a fair price considering its value to me.
Thanks for the offer, Bob.  How about we meet in the middle at $125?
I appreciate your flexibility, Alice. However, I was thinking more along the lines of $115. I'm really interested in the product, but I have to be mindful of my budget.
